name: atheos
description: Atheos is a self-hosted web-based IDE designed for fast development workflows. It includes file management, syntax highlighting, and plugins, all within the browser without needing traditional desktop editors.

features.title: File Management
features.description: Complete project file organization and navigation. Structured workspace

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with custom plugins. Customizable environment

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Optimized for quick development cycles. Efficient coding

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own development environment. Complete control

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multiple users can work on same server. Team development

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Minimal resource usage for smooth performance. Fast and responsive
